fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Hi Jump Kick** - Attack your target, if it fails to hit by any means, you lose your defense for this night and the next one.

**Brick Break** - Attack your target, this ignores passive defense. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Failing **Hi Jump Kick** with no defense deals a powerful attack to yourself.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: **Moxie** - After a successful kill, upgrades your attack to Powerful the next night.
